data.name: Green Shard
data.summary: No effect. Can be traded for items or moves.
data.description:
No effect.

In Diamond and Pearl, trade ten for a []{move:hail} TM in the house midway along the southern section of []{location:sinnoh-route-212}.

In Platinum, trade to move tutors on []{location:sinnoh-route-212}, in []{location:snowpoint-city}, and in the []{location:survival-area}.  Eight shards total are required per tutelage, but the particular combination of colors varies by move.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for an []{item:aguav-berry}, a []{item:lum-berry}, and a []{item:rawst-berry} with the Juggler near the Pokémon Center in []{location:violet-city}.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for a []{item:durin-berry}, a []{item:hondew-berry}, and a []{item:wepear-berry} with the Juggler near the []{location:pal-park} entrance in []{location:fuchsia-city}.
